trans-unit.source: Provides the data portion of an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a parte de dados de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This is a sealed class, so you can not inherit from it.
trans-unit.target: Esta é uma classe selada, pelo que não pode herdar a partir do mesmo.

trans-unit.source: Also, the constructor is private, so you cannot create a new instance of it.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o construtor é privado, pelo que não é possível criar uma nova instância do mesmo.

trans-unit.source: An ImageListStreamer is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: Um ImageListStreamer é devolvido pela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you cannot use this class to load images to an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> control by directly assigning the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A> property from one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, não é possível utilizar esta classe para carregar as imagens para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>controlo atribuindo diretamente a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A>propriedade a partir de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: Instead you should directly assign one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> instance to another (for example, `ImageList2 = ImageList1)`.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, deve atribuir diretamente um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>instância para outra (por exemplo, `ImageList2 = ImageList1)`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pela instância atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar `Dispose` quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O `Dispose` método mantém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Após a chamada `Dispose`, tem de libertar todas as referências ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>foi occupying.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada `Dispose` antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não serão libertados enquanto as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> com os dados necessários para serializar o objeto de destino.

trans-unit.source: For more information and a code example, see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações e um exemplo de código, consulte <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that is the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que é o destino para esta serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> cannot be populated with data because no data exists, or it is not in the correct format.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> não é possível povoar dados porque não existem dados ou não se encontra no formato correto.
